lines.text: No word from the boyfriend yet.
He'll probably turn up as soon as he reads the papers. From what I know about musicians, they're not that neat when they decide to get rid of their dames.

[noticing that curious onlookers are sticking their heads out of nearby windows]
You know, some solid citizens are gonna' get their brains blown out if they don't pull their heads in... not that they got any brains to begin with.
I'm waiting for the sound truck...
get your heads out of the windows. There may be shooting here!

[Referring to photographing the dead body]
How about one with the sheet off, Lieutenant? Just one, that's all.
Listen, food's too expensive to spoil people's appetite for breakfast. I wouldn't want a dead girl on my front page.
I don't like dead girls on the front page or anywhere else.

[Interjecting]
Should've been with me last night. You wouldn't have liked a couple of live ones. I had a lot of trouble last night.
